titleStmt.title: Poemata latina et graeca, una cum quibusdam inscriptionibus.

titleStmt.author: Schurtzfleisch, Konrad Samuel

change.item: tagging and TEI header added; typed text - structural tagging complete - semantic tagging complete - Morpheus spell-check
